import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Star, CheckCircle, TrendingUp, Shield, Target, ArrowLeft, FileText } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom'; const LocalCitations = () => { const features = [ { icon: CheckCircle, title: '150x High DA Local Citations', description: 'Premium manually built citations on high Domain Authority local directories.' }, { icon: Shield, title: '100% Safe & Manual', description: 'All citations are manually created with care based on extensive Local SEO experience.' }, { icon: Target, title: 'NAP Consistency', description: '100% consistent Name, Address, Phone information across all platforms.' }, { icon: TrendingUp, title: 'Proven Results', description: 'Tested strategy that delivers measurable ranking improvements.' }, { icon: FileText, title: 'Full Reporting', description: 'Complete report with login access via Google Sheet for transparency.' } ]; const requirements = [ 'Your/client website url', 'Main target keyword & 10 supporting keywords', 'NAP (business name, address, phone number)', 'GBP link', 'Short description of your company (110 characters)', 'E-mail Address of your business' ]; return (
{/* Header */}
Back to Packages

Local Citations for Local SEO

Supercharge your online presence with 100% manually built, high-DA local citations—designed to boost your rankings on Google Maps and organic search.

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Overview */}

What Will You Get?

These citations act as digital endorsements, signaling trust and legitimacy to search engines like Google and Bing. The more consistent and widespread your citations, the stronger your local ranking power.

📈 More visibility. More traffic. More business.

Start building your local authority—the smart way.

 {/* Features Grid */} {features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

 ))} {/* Service Features */}

What's Included

  • 150x High DA Local Citations (Premium)
  • Fresh accounts for each listing
  • 100% NAP consistency (Name, Address, Phone)
  • Logo included for brand authority
  • Search engine-friendly placements
  • Proven ranking improvements
  • Full report with login access (Google Sheet)
{/* Safety Section */}

❓ Question: Is the High DA Local Citations Strategy safe?

Answer: Absolutely—100% safe, proven, and tested.

All citations are manually created with care based on our extensive experience in Local SEO. We only use trusted, search engine-friendly directories known to positively impact local rankings.

✨ And for your peace of mind:

If your website or Google Business Profile (GBP) gets suspended due to our work, we offer a full refund. That's how confident we are in the safety and effectiveness of our strategy.

{/* Requirements */}

What Do We Need From You?

Ready to Build Your Local Authority?

); }; export default LocalCitations;
